entry.title: Gold Nugget Charm
entry.summary:
Vendor: Watchus
Type: Charm - Medium
Price: 4.80 - 9.00 (5 variants)

24 Karat Gold Plated Nugget Charm. Ever wish you could have struck gold during the Gold Rush? Now you can with this "nugget" that has a gold finish.

  • Gold Plated 24K
  • Made in the U.S.A.
  • Three Dimensional
  • Designed by Nancy Dreishpoon
  • Copyrighted
